#labels Featured
*Version 1.1 - released 2013-03-26*
  * State history, which is an array of all the previous states that the state machine has been in
  * `GoBack` method to enable the state machine to go back to the latest state without the use of triggers.
  * New sample in the source solution: [https://code.google.com/p/solid-state/downloads/detail?name=WizardSample.1.1.0.zip WizardSample], which demonstrates how a simple Windows Forms wizard can be built using each wizard page as a state.
